channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Son
channel.desc: Drama, Family, Thriller 2022 Peter lives an idyllic life with his wife, Beth, and their child, but their family life turns upside down when his ex-wife and son enter the equation, and the son commits suicide. Hugh Jackman, Laura Dern, Anthony Hopkins, Zen McGrath, Vanessa Kirby, William Hope, Florian Zeller, Christopher Hampton, Florian Zeller.
